p: In current situations, every day a large number of the population is being infected from SARS-CoV-2. The need of the hour is the development of a novel therapeutic approach to confront the global crisis. Nucleic acid-based therapy is a novel therapeutic approach and has shown assuring results against SARS-CoV; therefore, its use is being explored for COVID-19. mRNA-1273 and INO-4800 are showing promising results in clinical trials in treating SARS-CoV-2 infection. Recent advancements in technology have provided better ways for specific delivery of these active biomolecules to the target cells without producing side effects. Several nucleic acid-based vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 are in the primary stages in the clinical trials.
